original_text: He took not away the pillar of the cloud by day, nor the pillar of fire by night, from before the people.
korean_text: 낮에는 구름 기둥, 밤에는 불 기둥이 백성 앞에서 떠나지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: He took not away the pillar of the cloud by day
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 낮에는 구름 기둥을 치우지 않았고

sentences.original_text: nor the pillar of fire by night
